-Well, why don't you hear out what-- -Alice.
Ms. Coyle gave you a little bit of authority,

visiting hours are almost over.

Jenna McNeil.

translation.ko: 사실 이 시설에는 흥미로운 역사가 있는데요

translation.en: You know, I've got some background information on the first Mint.
translation.ko: 저한테 최초의 조폐국에 관한 참고 자료가 좀 있거든요

translation.en: A lot of stuff from the bicentennial celebration.
Would that be helpful for your research?
That would be amazing. Thank you.
Great.
[softly] Let me see.
-[mutters] -So, you've got two kids?
Yup. Nate is two, and Samantha is three and a half.
translation.ko: 그렇죠, 네이트는 두 살 서맨사는 세 살 반이에요

translation.en: Wow. That must be a lot for you and your wife.
Yeah, it is.
I think it's here.
-Jess loves every minute of it. [exhales] -I bet.
All right. Here you go.
Actually, um, would you mind making copies for the editor?
translation.ko: 편집장님께 보여 드릴 사본 좀 부탁드려도 될까요?

translation.en: If you don't mind.
-Not a problem. -Thank you.
Come on. Hurry.
Jason, please.
Okay, how long will this take?
[Benny] Depends on how complex the scan is.
We need as much info as possible to make a good copy.
translation.ko: 제대로 된 사본을 만들려면 최대한 많은 정보가 필요해

translation.en: This way.
-[computer beeps] -[keyboard clacking]
All right, I have it for you here.
It's a lot, but I promise you it's all interesting stuff.
Wow! [chuckles]
Hey! Hey!
My classroom, now.
I know you guys are skipping class, and I don't know why,
translation.ko: 너희 수업 빠진 거 알아 아직 그 이유는 모르지만

translation.en: but I'll find out eventually.
So why don't you just tell me now, before I give you all detention.
translation.ko: 방과 후에 남고 싶지 않으면 지금 말하는 게 좋을걸

translation.en: But you don't know what we were doing.
-So can we go? -No.
And I absolutely refuse to believe
that a student who has been suspended, not once, but three times
translation.ko: 불법 해킹 때문에 한 번도 아니고 세 번이나 정학당해놓고

translation.en: for illegal hacking activity is just skipping class for no reason.
translation.ko: 한 번도 아니고 세 번이나 정학당해놓고 이유 없이 수업을 빠지다니

translation.en: I should probably check your grades.
-Make sure you're not-- -Whoa! I earn my grades.
I'm sure you do.
Man, don't judge her. That's not what's going on.
I am not "man." I am Mr. Rankin.
Now, why don't you tell me how the four of you ended up together?
translation.ko: 왜 너희 넷이 몰려다니는지 순순히 자백하시지?

translation.en: Why wouldn't the four of us be together?
translation.ko: 저희 넷이 모이면 안 될 이유라도 있어요?

translation.en: You know what I mean.
I don't.
We were working on your design project.
translation.ko: 선생님의 디자인 과제를 같이 하던 중이었어요

translation.en: It was way more work than we anticipated, so we decided to help each other.
translation.ko: 생각보다 할 일이 많아서 서로 돕기로 했죠

translation.en: Skipped a few classes to finish it, but it won't happen again.
translation.ko: 그러다 수업도 몇 번 빠졌지만 다시는 그런 일 없을 거예요

translation.en: You skipped classes to do school work?
Yeah. [chuckles]
Yeah.
If I can prove that you were doing something
translation.ko: 만약 너희들이 해서는 안 될 일을 했단 걸

translation.en: that you shouldn't be doing...
and I will...
all four of you are going to be expelled.
translation.ko: 그러면 너희 넷 모두 퇴학당할 줄 알아라

translation.en: If there's a school to be expelled from by the time you figure that out.
translation.ko: 그때까지 퇴학당할 학교가 남아 있다면 말이죠

translation.en: That's not my fault, Hodges.
Hey.
You all right?
Yeah, it's fine.
-[Dakota] Bye, guys. -[Benny] See you.
Bye.
I'm used to it.
You shouldn't be.
He shouldn't have said that.
You're, uh...
you're better than that. You're...
Anyway, I'll, uh, see you later.
Thanks for the ride.
Yeah.
I, uh, looked at the reader. The scan was clean.
So I should be able to make a copy tonight.
translation.ko: 오늘 밤부터 복제품을 만들 수 있을 것 같아

translation.en: That's good.
You've made IDs before?
Yeah. [scoffs]
Yeah, I've made a few.
-I'm not a criminal, you know. -No.
No, no, that's not what I meant at all.
[stammers] I'm sorry. It's not okay.
I know what it feels like
to have people expect you to be something that you're not.
translation.ko: 사람들이 멋대로 나란 사람에 대해 단정 짓는 거

translation.en: -It's not fair. -[chuckling] Yeah.
It's no secret that I got arrested before I came to Dennington.
translation.ko: 전학 오기 전에 체포됐던 게 숨길 일은 아니지

translation.en: I only made ten IDs.
And I didn't even do it for the extra cash, you know,
it was...
It was for people in my neighborhood who were getting stopped by immigration.
Sometimes at Dennington,
I feel like the people that I made those IDs for.
translation.ko: 내가 그 이웃이 된 것 같은 심정을 느낄 때가 있어

translation.en: I'm always being watched
by these people who are just waiting for me to mess up.
I really don't think that's true.
I mean, they gave you a scholarship.
Yeah, because I'm smart.
I want to go to college. I want to be an engineer.
translation.ko: 난 대학교에 가고 싶어 공학자가 되고 싶거든

translation.en: I think it's great that you know what you want to do.
translation.ko: 하고 싶은 일을 아는 것 자체가 대단한 거야

translation.en: I have all these ideas but... [sighs]
people keep telling me that I'm unrealistic.
I have friends here, but they don't really know who I am.
translation.ko: 학교 친구들이 있긴 하지만 진짜 내가 어떤 사람인지는 모르지

translation.en: That's what I'm saying, Dakota.
Just because people expect you to be something
translation.ko: 사람들이 기대하는 네 모습이 있다고 해도

translation.en: doesn't mean you have to be it.
You missed the visiting hours again today.
Practicing a little... What are you doing here?
translation.ko: 연습 때문에요 여기서 뭐 하는 거예요?

translation.en: I just came by to drop off some paperwork.
I saw your mom was packing all this stuff up herself, so...
translation.ko: 네 어머니 혼자 이걸 다 싸고 계시길래

translation.en: Okay, well, I'm here now.
Jason, please, I don't want you to think of me as the bad guy here.
translation.ko: 제이슨, 나를 불청객으로 생각하지 않았으면 좋겠구나

translation.en: You're making us move out of the headmaster's house before he's even gone to trial.
translation.ko: 재판 전에 우릴 교장 관사에서 쫓아낸 게 누군데요

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I represent the board. It's... it's not just my decision.
translation.ko: 그건 내 결정이 아니라 이사회가 정한 걸 내가 전한 것뿐이란다

translation.en: The president of the board, that's just a title then?
I wish I wasn't the one to have to tell you this, but, uh...
translation.ko: 이런 말 하게 돼 유감이다만 너희 아버지는

translation.en: your dad's gonna plead guilty.
translation.ko: 결국 유죄를 인정할 수밖에 없을 거야

translation.en: They know he broke the law. There's no way around it.
translation.ko: 법을 어긴 게 명백해 빠져나갈 구석이 없지

translation.en: And even with a plea deal, he's gonna do time.
translation.ko: 형량 거래를 한다 쳐도 복역은 피할 수 없어

translation.en: You don't know that.
I don't have time for this.
What are you doing? We got practice at Max's.
translation.ko: 뭐 하는 거야? 맥스네 집에서 연습 있잖아

translation.en: [groans] I'm just dropping off some of your stuff.
translation.ko: 네 물건 전해 주러 온 거야

translation.en: Why? I thought you were driving.
The band wants a break.
What do you mean, "a break"? We have to play the dance.
translation.ko: 쉬겠다니 무슨 말이야? 종강 파티는 어쩌고?

translation.en: Right. Um... the guys...
feel like you're not into this anymore. You missed practice three times.
translation.ko: 네가 의욕이 없어 보인대 세 번이나 빠졌잖아

translation.en: What is that supposed to mean?
You know how you are.
You're really into something until you're not.
translation.ko: 처음에만 파고들지 금방 식어 버리는 거

translation.en: You were probably gonna quit anyways.
Look, you... you got a lot going on.
I'm sorry.
See you.
-Hello. -Hi, Grandma.
How was school today?
Good.
Did you find out about the scholarship?
[sighs] Not yet.
Well, when are you gonna find out?
I don't know. Soon.
We need to know so we can make a plan in case it doesn't come through.
translation.ko: 미리 알아야 어떻게 할지 계획을 세우지

translation.en: I'll talk to them tomorrow.
Okay.
[Alice] Hey! I thought I saw you down here.
Why aren't you at Junibel's party?
What are you still doing at school?
I was just at the computer lab.
It's kind of nice at night. Quiet.
My dad...
pleaded guilty.
So...
Guess he really did it.
Shit.
I'm so sorry.
I just can't respect him anymore, you know what I mean? [inhales]
translation.ko: 이제 존경할 수가 없어 무슨 말인지 알아?

translation.en: Parents do shitty things.
I mean... [gulps]
my parents cheat on each other.
And they think it's fine,
because they come home for dinner and act like everything is totally normal.
translation.ko: 집에서 함께 저녁 먹고 다 괜찮은 양 행동하니까

translation.en: That's awful.
I'm just... used to it.
Yeah, but they're the ones who are supposed to have their shit together.
translation.ko: 정작 고통받아야 하는 건 그 두 사람이잖아

translation.en: -Yeah. -Have it figured out.
So I think, if they're cheating,
then why can't we cheat the system a little bit?
translation.ko: 우리도 시스템을 살짝 속여도 된다고 생각해

translation.en: If the adults are the ones who mess things up,
then why do they get to tell us how it's gonna be?
translation.ko: 왜 우리가 그 사람들 얘기를 들어야 해?

translation.en: That's just the thing,
I don't know that I'm the kind of guy who...
translation.ko: 그냥 나는 내가... 나 자신이 어떤 사람인지

translation.en: I don't know, um...
Who finishes sentences?
Who finishes anything, apparently.
You're doing your best, I think.
How are you always so cool about everything?
translation.ko: 넌 어쩜 그렇게 매사에 쿨할 수 있어?

translation.en: Cool?
-Yeah. -[scoffs]
Like, cool and... collected.
And funny, you know.
Resourceful, too.
Resourceful?
Yeah.
Well, now you're just trying to sound smart again.
translation.ko: 이제 다시 똑똑한 척 말하는 것처럼 들리네

translation.en: What?
Maybe we shouldn't complicate things.
translation.ko: 일을 복잡하게 만들어선 안 될 것 같아

translation.en: We just started--
Right... [chuckles] and after we're finished,
you'll just pretend that I don't exist.
translation.ko: 넌 나를 없는 사람 취급할 테고

translation.en: No, that's not what I'm saying.
-I just think that-- -Sure.
If you need a grade, or a schedule change,
or to break into a government institution,
translation.ko: 정부 기관에 침입해야 하는 그런 때에나

translation.en: I'm sure I'll be the first person you call.
I have to go.
Hey.
Hey.
I, uh...
I thought you never come to these things.
translation.ko: 넌 이런 데는 절대 안 올 줄 알았어

translation.en: I, um...
kind of figured you'd be here, so...
Well, I'm glad you did.
I like talking to you.
I like talking to you, too.
I was, um... I was thinking about what you said.
I was thinking about it a lot, actually.
I'm sorry we didn't get to talk more. That was stupid.
So I...
We... we can't.
[Ethan] Hey, there's your girlfriend.
Hey, Benny.
What are you doing here?
Wow. Not used to seeing you at these things.
translation.ko: 맙소사, 네가 이런 데 오다니 별일이네

translation.en: Guess I didn't realize I needed your permission
translation.ko: 다른 사람이 주최한 파티에 참석하는 데

translation.en: to come to someone else's party.
No, just, you're in North Philly, right?
-How many buses did it take to get here? -Dylan.
No, I'm... What? We're just trying to be nice.
-Get to know him a little bit. -You did time, right?
translation.ko: - 서로 알아 갈 겸 - 너 복역했었지?

translation.en: Before transferring to Dennington?
Not really. No.
Please stop.
What? You actually wanna hang out with this guy?
translation.ko: 왜, 진짜 얘랑 어울리고 싶어서 그래?

translation.en: Listen, you don't need to be a dick.
Did you just call me a dick?
Seriously, what are you doing here?
-Stop. -[Dylan] No.
I'm here because I'm friends with Dakota.
Right?
Just go.
Hey, this is nothing.
Please?
She's right. It's nothing.
You sure you don't wanna go with your friends?
I don't...
What, do you want me to say it's okay, so you don't have to feel bad?
translation.ko: 따라가 보라고 해야 네가 불편하지 않겠지?

translation.en: Wait, what?
No. No, I get it. You gotta look out for you.
None of these people care about you.
translation.ko: 아무도 너를 신경 써 주지 않으니까

translation.en: Isn't that what you said?
No, I said they don't know the real me.
translation.ko: 아니, 진짜 내 모습을 모른다고 했었지

translation.en: What's the difference?
You're exactly what all these people think you are.
I think you should leave.
translation.ko: 그만 가 보는 게 좋을 것 같아

translation.en: Yeah.
Can we run it one more time, please?
Yeah.
Alice has what she needs to manipulate the digital inventory,
loop the security feeds and put the design into production.
translation.ko: 감시 영상을 반복 재생해서 디자인을 생산하면 돼

translation.en: Benny's fake die will be used to replace the real one
translation.ko: 지난번에 우리가 두고 온 베니의 가짜 틀이

translation.en: that we altered last time and left there.
translation.ko: 지난번에 우리가 두고 온 베니의 가짜 틀이 진짜와 대체됐으니까

translation.en: The fake die is not sturdy enough to do an actual run,
translation.ko: 가짜 틀은 실제로 쓰일 만큼 아주 튼튼하진 않으니까

translation.en: so it'll probably break.
But when that happens,
they'll just assume that it was faulty materials
and replace the original on their own.
So, we get in, we do the run, Alice covers our tracks, virtually,
translation.ko: 우리가 들어가서 작업할 때 앨리스가 흔적을 지우고

translation.en: and we get out.
If we get in.
You realize, if this doesn't go perfectly, we are all going to jail?
translation.ko: 계획이 틀어졌다가는 전부 감옥행인 거 알지?

translation.en: Dakota, would you just--
translation.ko: - 다코타, 그냥 좀... - 아버지랑 얘기한 적 있어?

translation.en: Have you even spoken to your dad yet, Jay? Do you realize how bad this could be?
translation.ko: - 다코타, 그냥 좀... - 아버지랑 얘기한 적 있어? 제이? 이게 얼마나 큰 죄가 될지 알고는 있어?

translation.en: -Would you just shut up? -She's right.
The production floor is complicated.
And we're entirely relying on the fake IDs
actually getting us in as the HVAC company.
The IDs will work.
If anything goes wrong, it's not gonna be on me.
translation.ko: 만약 일이 틀어져도 나 때문은 아니란 거야

translation.en: How can you be so sure?
Seriously?
You're gonna question me after you barely made it past security?
translation.ko: 겨우 보안 통과했던 주제에 그런 말 하는 거야?

translation.en: I got us in, didn't I?
If something goes wrong--
Stop saying that something's gonna go wrong.
I don't know what else you want from me, here.
I'm doing everything I know how to do.
translation.ko: 내가 아는 건 전부 하고 있단 말이야

translation.en: Okay?
So, let's all relax...
and figure out what's next. What else do we need?
translation.ko: 다음은 어떻게 할지 뭐가 필요할지 생각해 봐

translation.en: Well, I need a song list for the Winter Formal on Saturday.
translation.ko: 종강 파티 때 부를 노래 목록이 필요해

translation.en: Yeah.
About that. They, uh... The band has split up.
What?
-When were you planning on telling me? -It's complicated.
You never go through with things! No wonder your band split up!
translation.ko: 넌 뭐 하나 제대로 하는 법이 없어! 밴드가 해산한 것도 당연하지

translation.en: And, by the way, what about the quarters?
How are we gonna sell them? Have you thought about that?
translation.ko: 어떻게 팔 건데? 그 생각은 해 봤어?

translation.en: I'm still working on that part.
I don't know how you expect people to trust you when you haven't even thought things through.
translation.ko: 생각할 줄도 모르는 사람을 어떻게 믿으라는 건지

translation.en: -Jay-- -Would you stop calling me Jay, Dakota?
Look, we're not together anymore. You don't own me.
I will get your music, I will get the coins,
and I will figure out everything for everybody.
Okay? Does that sound good?
Does anybody else need anything while I'm at it?
You know what? This...
This is over.
Alice, take the coin out of production. Delete it.
translation.ko: 앨리스, 동전 생산 중단해 삭제해 버려

translation.en: Jason--
Just do it.
Good job.
You know what? Yeah.
This was a shit idea from the very start.
Thanks for coming.
I'm sorry you have to see me like this.
How could you do it?
Not just to me, but to Mom. And the school.
Everybody you know. How could you be so selfish?
translation.ko: 아는 사람 모두한테 어떻게 이럴 수가 있어요?

translation.en: It's not like that.
The board, they rejected my proposals for investing in new programs.
translation.ko: 새 프로그램에 투자하자는 내 요청을 이사회가 거부했어

translation.en: They didn't wanna take a risk.
-And Harold Smerconish and I-- -Wait. Wait.
translation.ko: 해럴드 스머코니시와 난... 잠깐만요 스머코니시도 알고 있었어요?

translation.en: Smerconish knew about this?
He didn't agree with the rest of the board.
He said that I should go through with the investments.
So I transferred the money into a private bank account.
translation.ko: 그래서 돈을 사설 계좌로 송금한 거야

translation.en: And he said he wouldn't tell the rest of the board until it had paid off.
translation.ko: 돈을 메꿀 때까지 이사회에 말해서는 안 된다고 하더구나

translation.en: That was the plan.
It's not what you think.
I just wanted to make a real difference.
translation.ko: 나는 진짜 변화를 일으키고 싶었을 뿐이야

translation.en: [Greg on headphones] I know you're blowing off steam, or whatever,
but can you not murder everyone in this village
translation.ko: 마을 사람들은 그만 죽이면 안 될까

translation.en: before we finish the quest?
[sighing] Sorry.
Yeah, it's okay. I know it sucks.
[Alice] Yeah, it sucks, but, like,
what would you do?
We worked really hard on our whole...
design project thing, and now everyone just wants to drop out.
translation.ko: 디자인 과제 말이야 그런데 다들 그만두려고 해

translation.en: So what? Just make a new group.
translation.ko: 뭐 어때 새 그룹 만들면 되지

translation.en: I don't know, maybe include your best friend, me, next time?
translation.ko: 다음번에는 네 절친인 나도 끼워 주는 건 어떨까?

translation.en: It's not like that, Greg.
We were doing something important.
Something that really mattered.
Like what? Extra credit?
Um... yeah.
Yeah.
Okay. Uh...
Well, if it were me, I would just go ahead and sign up for the extra credit anyway.
translation.ko: 나라면 추가 점수 신청서에 확 서명해 버리고

translation.en: And tell them you already signed up and it's too late to bail,
translation.ko: 애들한테 말해서 그만둘 수 없게 만들 거야

translation.en: especially with all the work you did.
Then they'd have to help you finish it.
translation.ko: 끝날 때까지 어쩔 수 없이 도와주겠지

translation.en: You know, that's not the worst idea.
[Greg] Important decisions should not be left to the Jason Hodges of the world.
translation.ko: 제이슨 하지스 같은 놈한테 중요한 결정을 맡기면 안 돼

people like Smerconish, they're the ones who always win.
translation.ko: 스머코니시 같은 사람들이 이기게 되는 것 같아

translation.en: I think... we did what we had to do.
translation.ko: 난... 우리가 해야 할 일을 했다고 생각해

translation.en: I'm not coming back to school in the fall.
translation.ko: 난 가을 학기 전에 학교 그만둘 거야

translation.en: What? Why?
We just saved the school.
I just don't want to be my dad's legacy here.
translation.ko: 여기서 계속 아빠 그늘 아래 살고 싶지 않아

translation.en: I want to leave all of that behind.
With the statue and everything that we did here tonight.
translation.ko: 철제 조각상이랑 오늘 밤에 우리가 했던 일들까지 전부 다...

translation.en: Okay.
I'm not skipping town or anything.
Getting to know you... has been...
one of the best things to happen to me in a... a really long time.
translation.ko: 여태 내가 살면서 가장 좋았던 때 같아

translation.en: I'm not just gonna give all that up because I'm moving schools.
translation.ko: 학교를 옮긴다고 해서 그걸 포기하진 않을 거야

translation.en: You're so smart.
Good at, um... knowing who you are. I'm...
translation.ko: 자기 자신에 대해서 잘 알고 있고...

translation.en: I'm still trying to learn how to do that.
So...
I don't know if this is making any sense.
translation.ko: 이게 다 말이나 되는지 잘 모르겠다

translation.en: What?
You know, if you're trying to sound smart,
translation.ko: 똑똑한 척 말하려고 한 거면, 있잖아

translation.en: I think it might actually be working this time.
Yeah?
Yeah.
